summary: The Garrisons live with a Great Dane who thinks he's a dainty dachshund. His identity crisis results in an uproarious series of household crises that reduce the Garrisons' house to shambles.
cast: Dean Jones|Suzanne Pleshette|Charles Ruggles|Kelly Thordsen|Parley Baer|Robert Kino|Mako|Charles Lane|Don Ames|George Bruggeman|Brutus|Chole|Danke|Tony Dante|Joe Devlin|Duchess|Paul Frees|Ben Frommer|Sam Harris|Ed Haskett|Heidi|Bob Jellison|Kenner G. Kemp|Dorothy Konrad|Gil Lamb|William Meader|Joe Phillips|Paul Power|Tony Regan|Leoda Richards|Al Roberts|Sweetie-Kins|Dick Wessel|Wilhelmina
keywords: great dane|dachshund|speeding vehicle|siren the alarm|dog movie
title: Los perros de mi mujer
